name: Final Illusion Zero(Rebochetto)
description:
TBD:

- Character advancement 60% done

- Boss fights

- Temporary dialogues to be switched for real ones and quests enabled.

- VFX and overall gameplay polish

- Right now only about 10% of game sounds and music are ingame, adaptive SFX and music are disabled.

- advanced game mechanics disabled (stuns, complex abilities)

- polish levels and swap placeholder assets for custom made, remodel main character and placeholder cat NPCs.

PS Our team hopes this game gives you a moment of fun and a smile, cheers!
